```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
n <- sample(1: 6, 1)
L <- signif(runif(1, 0.2, 2), 3)

ans <- signif(2 * L / n , 3)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 6)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%g m", signif(sc$questions, 3))
```

Question
========
What is the wavelength of harmonic number `r n` in an open-pipe resonator of length `r fmt(L, 2)` m?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The wavelength is

$$ \lambda = \frac{2 L}{n} = `r ans` \,\mathsf{m} $$
